Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #3# major items.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides #Damp's Hut#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Bottom Center

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##Jabu Jabu's Belly## has #3# major items.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Bombs (10 pieces)# can be found at #Zora's Domain#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that shooting #the sun# grants #a Red Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Slingshot#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Zora's Domain# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides #ReDeads# guarding a chest.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a #Big Skulltula# guarding a Gold one.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Ruto's Letter#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that Epona is an exceptional horse. Able to clear canyons in a single bound.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #Saria's Song#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #20 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #4# major items.
